resources.string: YOU HAVE BEEN STOPPED BY THE POLICE! \n Select an option below.

If you accept a cargo check, you must give up any illegal goods and pay a fine. 

If you bribe, you must fork over 5% of your total credits. 

If you flee, you will be deemed unlawful and will be stopped more often
YOU HAVE BEEN ATTACKED BY PIRATES! \n Select an option below.

If you surrender, the pirates will take all of your cargo. 

If you fight, ensure that your fighter points exceed those of the pirates and fight to the death! 

If you flee, ensure that your pilot points exceed those of the pirates and flee for your life!
